Name: :math:`V_\text{END}^{t,~b}`
Description: Basins water volume at the end of the optimization

Name: :math:`V_\text{SPIL}^{t,~b}`
Description: Spilled water volumes when basins are full

Name: :math:`State^{t,~b,~s}`
Description: The state of a basin derived from its volume:  :math:`State^{t, b, s} = \begin{cases} 1 \text{ if } V_\text{BAS}^{t, b} \in  \left[ V_\text{MIN}^{b,~s_b} ;V_\text{MAX}^{b,~s_b} \right] \\ 0 \text{ otherwise} \end{cases}`

Name: :math:`Run_\text{HYDRO}^{t,~h}`
Description: Binary variable to indicates if ON/OFF hydro power plant is  running or not

Name: :math:`P_\text{HYDRO}^{t,~h}`
Description: Electrical power produced or consumed by a hydro power plant

Name: :math:`Q^{t,~h}`
Description: Amount of water that flows through an hydro power plant

Name: :math:`Q_\text{S}^{t,~h,~s}`
Description: Amount of water that flows through a hydro power plant for each corresponding basin state

Name: :math:`P_\text{ANC}^{f}`
Description: Flexible power sell to the ancilliary market

Name: :math:`V_\text{QUOTA}^{h}`
Description: Water volume quota that can flow through an hydro power plant (from first stage optimization)

Name: :math:`dV_\text{+}^{h}`
Description: Overage water volume flowing through an hydro power plant compared to the first stage volume quota

Name: :math:`dV_\text{-}^{h}`
Description: Shortage water volume flowing through an hydro power plant compared to the first stage volume quota
